column4: hi all - does ubuntu have frequent updates - I am only asking as I downloaded the 7.10 media a while ago and built a laptop at the weekend but the number of updates that downloaded were very small - I used to use fedora and I would have had probably 100 updates - I understand not many packages were on at the start but still didnt seem many
yes, there are updates very frequently.
on a new install I get over 100 updates so far.
isn't the kernel updated by the same update process?
